name: 's Life
description:
Two notes for my friends.

Firstly, I don't know how the magic of second uncle works. But at least I know second uncle cannot heal me. To figure out what the life should be like  is a permanant task for ourselves.

Secondly, The input method is simply moving the mouse over the entities within the game, to start the game move the mouse over square. No clicking is required during gameplay.

Enjoy the game.

---------------------------------------------------------

Lastly, I love  Jonathan Blow and Zitao Ye.
